org.to2mbn.jmccc.launch

Interface Launcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Jmccc

    public interface Launcher
    A Launcher is used to launch minecraft.
    You can use Jmccc.getLauncher() to get a launcher object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LaunchResult launch(LaunchOption option)
      Launches minecraft.
      LaunchResult launch(LaunchOption option, GameProcessListener listener)
      Launches minecraft.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        LaunchResult launch(LaunchOption option)
             throws LaunchException
        Launches minecraft.

        We will create a group of daemon threads to pump the stdout and stderr of the subprocess.
        We recommend you NOT to call ProcessMonitor.stop(). This may cause subprocess to block, and it's not always effective. You don't need to stop the monitor threads because they are daemon.

        Parameters:
        option - the launching option
        Returns:
        the launching result
        Throws:
        LaunchException - if we fail to launch the game
        NullPointerException - if option==null
        See Also:
        LaunchResult, LaunchException, ProcessMonitor.stop()

      • launch

        LaunchResult launch(LaunchOption option,
                    GameProcessListener listener)
             throws LaunchException
        Launches minecraft.

        If listener!=null, we will create a group of non-daemon threads to receive the logs from the subprocess and report them to the given listener. Otherwise, we will create a group of daemon threads to pump the stdout and stderr of the sub process.

        We recommend you NOT to call ProcessMonitor.stop() unless you are going to exit the jvm and listener!=null. This may cause subprocess to block and it's not always effective.

        Parameters:
        option - the launching option
        listener - the listener to receive logs from the subprocess
        Returns:
        the launching result
        Throws:
        LaunchException - if we fail to launch the game
        NullPointerException - if option==null
        See Also:
        LaunchResult, ProcessMonitor, GameProcessListener, LaunchException, ProcessMonitor.stop()
